title: A Team
body: 1. Hi i am Moritz i am a league player i love playing it it is something that i am happy with i am gold 3 but  i havent played ranked int a long time i am a realy safe and happy porson in game i allways play the best i can my bigest rule in game is not to feed and this is why i am asking you to play with me as you may now that in the world of lol thay are pepole how are not as skilled as others i know that ther are way better players then i am i just ehont a team hou i can trust and know what to do so please if you are interested in playing with me  contact me my player name is moritzringeltaub in euw i am sorry about my grammer i main suport and top{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
